title: The Heart of Mid-Lothian, Complete
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: Every Covenanting scandal and absurdity, suchas the old story of Mess David Williamson--"Dainty Davie"--and hisremarkable prowess, and presence of mind at Cherrytrees, was raked up,and inserted in notes to Kirkton.

title: The Heart of Mid-Lothian, Volume 1
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: Every Covenanting scandal and absurdity, suchas the old story of Mess David Williamson--"Dainty Davie"--and hisremarkable prowess, and presence of mind at Cherrytrees, was raked up,and inserted in notes to Kirkton.

title: Wilson's Tales of the Borders and of Scotland, Volume 18
author: Alexander Leighton
snippet: If I binna lyin wi' the Mearns, I'll bewi' the Cherrytrees o' Mossnook--nae relations o' the Burnbanks, thoughmaybe as guid a family.
